sentences.sContent: The Air Force intends to integrate the aerostat radars with the three Airborne Warning and Control System AWACS being purchased from Israel.
sentences.sContent_eng: The Air Force intends to integrate the aerostat radars with the three Airborne Warning and Control System AWACS being purchased from Israel.
sentences.sCn: 空军打算把该高空气球的雷达和三架拥有机载预警和控制系统的预警机（AWACS）综合起来，目前AWACS正在从以色列购买。

trans.tranOther: a lighter-than-air craft, such as a balloon
